parameters.name: AddClientGeolocationHeader
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to include the header that indicates the geographical location of a client in an origin request. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: AddRealClientIpHeader
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to include the "ali-real-client-ip" header that indicates the client's real IP address in an origin request. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: SiteVersion
parameters.description: The version number of the website. You can use this parameter to specify a version of your website to apply the feature settings. By default, version 0 is used.
